name: Gouty Porcupine - Body-Type
description:
This is our submission for TDEMO 4 R-Type

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Space of left click to shoot.

Shoot or collide with white blood cells for an explosion.

Code and level design - Alex and Lewis

Art - Aaron and Iba

Sound and Music - Lewis

Most of this game is made from scratch using the references on Unity's website with the exception of the camera and AI path finding which is this tutorial:

http://www.youcontributegames.com/pathmovementtutorial/
